author: The Editorial Board
title: France Is on the March
text:
Add another to the list of unexpected headlines to emerge from this turbulent age: France is leading a supply-side revolution in Europe. France. The economy that until nine months ago seemed destined to be Europe’s sick man is experiencing an investment revival that’s starting to carry the rest of the eurozone.
The eurozone economy grew 2.5% in 2017, Europe’s statistics agency reported Tuesday—the best performance in a decade. Much of the credit goes to France, which reported economic growth at 1.9% for the year, the highest... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
